name: The First Transport Is Away!
Lore: '''When you''ve gotten past the energy shield, proceed directly to the rendevouz point. Understood? Good luck!''',
Text: 'Deploy on any system (except Hoth). Target a Medium Transport at a Hoth site. When reached by target: Retrieve X Force, where X = twice the number of passengers. Relocate Utinni Effect to Hoth system. Your total power is +2 in battles at Hoth sites.',
